name: The Sacred Tree
description:
Years ago, a large region (almost half a continent) on earth suffered a great disaster. It is not even known whether the people living in that area died or not because even approaching the borders of the area is very dangerous.

A group of people miraculously survived this disaster, but their lives still depend on a tree in a cave. It's been a long time, but they're still working to survive. You are on the expedition team. Your task is to research to survive.

Created in one week for the 2020 Epic MegaJam, with the theme "It's been a long time, but we're not done yet".

Not: The game is 4 friends' first game. We look forward to your feedback.
